mapper.select: select id, name, password, phone, app_id, channel_id, creation_date, last_login_date, last_update_date, profile_type, available from profile where phone = #{userAccount}
select id, name, password, phone, app_id, channel_id, creation_date, last_login_date, last_update_date, profile_type, available from profile where id = #{profileId}

SELECT m.parent_id as parentId, p.phone as cellPhone, p.name as parentName, concat(approved, '') as auditStatus FROM parent_student_map m INNER JOIN student s ON m.student_id = s.id INNER JOIN class c ON s.class_id = c.id INNER JOIN profile p ON p.id = m.parent_id WHERE c.head_teacher_id = #{id}
